monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.

spanGrp.span: A shepherd from one of the villages, a young boy, herding the sheep.

In the past, the shepherds' families would send them, let's say, water and milk. They would send them in a jar—sometimes water, other times food, bread, and onions. You know, tomatoes, basically any kind of food.
And this shepherd was herding the sheep, and his family had forgotten about him.
His lunch was delayed. He remained with an empty stomach. His family had forgotten about him, and his food was late.
A shepherd came to him from there, one who was on his way to his family in the village.
He said: "O you, go to my family and tell them—let's say his name was Ali—Ali sends his regards and says: 'Whoever brings me lunch, I will fuck them.'"
"Whoever brings me lunch, I will surely fuck them," meaning he swore an oath.
He said: "Alright, I will tell them." This one went to them and said: "Your son sends his regards and says: 'Whoever brings me lunch, why are not you sending him lunch?'"
"My food is delayed. Whoever brings me lunch, I will surely fuck them."
They said to his mother, and she replied: "I will take it to him, but I’m afraid—he's crazy. Our son is reckless; he might actually fuck me!"
His father said: "If I go, he and I will end up fighting. Either I will kill him, or he will kill me."
His sister didn’t dare and said: "I don’t have the courage to go. Your son is crazy, and he might do something to me!"
It was the old woman's turn—it was his grandmother's turn.
His grandmother took the food container and said: "I will go to him, my child. I am his grandmother; he won't bother me."
So she took the bundle of food and went to him, bringing him his meal.
She brought him the food and reached him. He opened the bundle, ate his meal, and drank his water. Then he said: "Grandmother!"
She replied: "Yes, my child!"He said: "Why did you come?"
"Didn't you hear what I told the messenger I sent with the message? I said, 'Whoever brings me the food, I will surely fuck them!'"
She said: "My child, what do I have to do with this? I didn’t know. No one told me. If they had told me, I would have brought you the food definitely."
He said: "O, grandmother, stop!" He grabbed his grandmother, put her down, put down his pants and banged her. He fucked his grandmother!
After he had intercourse with her, she grabbed her pants and went home
She came home and was asked: 'So, what did you do?' Her son asked her. She said: 'What did I do?'
Your crazy son fucked me. He did what he said!
He said: "What did he say and do?" She said: "He fucked me!"
He said: "Okay, wait, I will go to him this time." He said: "But if I go to him, we will fight, both of us."
I want to go and report him to the police, to the army, to the governor!
He went to the governor and reported him, saying: "My son did this and that, he fucked his grandmother."
The governor sent two soldiers and said: "Go and bring me this madman!"
They went and brought the madman. He came to the court. They brought him before the governor, where he stood in front of the governor, and the governor said to him:
The governor said: "What’s wrong with you? My son, what have you done? My son, what did you do?" He said: "My lord, what have I done? I fucked my grandmother."
"I fucked my father's mother. I fucked his mother once, but he fucks my mother every day, and I wasn't bothered!"
"It's been ten years his whole life he has been fucking my mother. He has fucked my mother a thousand times, and I fucked his mother just once, look how he complained about me. Is this possible?"
The governor laughed: "Go, get out! A madman, son of a madman." God bless you.
